Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Very nice coffee. We tried a variety of coffee‚Äôs and each of them were absolutely lovely. The flat white is as good as it can get and the espresso has a nice acidity and taste to it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Love the coffee. Barista was friendly. Yes was worth it and if I be there I will go again. The brownie was omg from another world. You should visit. You can sit outside and enjoy your coffee.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Great coffee, super friendly and helpful baristas and a nice rotating selection of roasted beans, which they're happy to give you advice on! Only shame is there's limited space so come at quiet times or do a coffee to go ;)

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text:
Great coffee and super yummy food!
Our favorite coffee place in Amsterdam, we are coming back almost every weekend!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Superb coffee, very tasty breakfast/brunch, a wonderful little terrace in the sun and just a great overal vibe created by the owner. A place in Amsterdam where you truly feel welcomed! Really hope the additional cocktailbar concept will work out as well!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text:
Great coffee and definitely a specialty coffee place.

The cafe is quite small and is very cute. ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: A nice place hidden in the centre. Variety of coffee choices and a small terrace before the shop. Espresso some acidity. Nice place to visit, have (if on time) real slow coffee as well.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Specialty coffee and gourmet food, what else? Don‚Äôt miss out their sandwiches and homemade pastries. Today I had this impeccable pulled pork brioche and donut with Nutella. These folks take serious approach towards their food and beverages. A big üëè

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: I truly enjoyed the coffee I had there, so I wanted to buy a bag of beans. When I started looking around I was rudely reproached by one of the servers ""please do not touch the bags, if you're not gonna buy them"". I then explained that I ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: I have been coming to Druppa ever since it opened, and it is a great place. I usually order a cappuccino, white tea, and something sweet (mainly the cherry brownie or the carrot cake). SO friggin' GOOD! And above all, the people working ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Super sweet, friendly, welcoming and caring staff. The coffee here has never disappointed me. I can also highly recommend having brunch here, it‚Äôs fresh, delicious and it‚Äôs slightly different from other brunch menus you see everywhere (try ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Amazing coffee, super tasty food and great service.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Great coffee and really nice stuff ! Thank you!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Hidden amongst average coffee is a place that truly prides itself in caffeinated beverages. I dream of their espresso martini!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text:
It's like visiting a sorcerer or a mad scientist place. Lots of mystery flasks, tubes and of course more traditional coffee brewing equipment.
The owner/barista is a friendly guy who can tell you some stories about coffee ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: If you are looking for the best coffee in Amsterdam, make your way to Drupa in Jordaan. They have the most delicious coffee around, roasted on the spot by the world class aficionados and owners themselves. Espresso, cappuccino, flat white, ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Very cozy place with so kind people. Great atmosphere and exactly delicious coffee. No matter what do you prefer espresso or flat white it will be very tasty.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Great atmosphere in this cosy specialty coffee bar in Jordaan (just off Westerstraat and Noorderkerk). Super friendly and welcoming customer service. ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: I had an expresso, beans from Columbia. The taste was ok, not too special. The coffee is roasted in the same room, so it is smelly. The toilet is dirty and should be repaired. A bit of a hip place, but strangely not many customers.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Amazing! Such craft and care put into each cup they serve. My chai latte was delicious, and all the coffee drinks I saw them prepare made me want to start drinking coffee. ;) Owners are incredibly friendly and welcoming as well. And a beautifully designed and comfortable space. Highly recommended!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Amazing place with wonderful energy. Owners are very kind. Coffee is just excellent and carrot cake is very tasty. The best coffee place in Amsterdam.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Lovely gezellig place to have amazing coffee! The have a nice selection and staff (owners?) were very helpful with us and explained their selection and process quite nicely. I had the Nicaraguan coffee prepared with the Kalita pour over ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Great coffee!! Fantastic roasts, the staff are  passionate and knowledgable and are not coffee snobs! Friendly vibe with cool decor! Check it out!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Best coffee I had for years! Excellent espresso, I loved the place.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Drupa: Delicious coffee, delightful coconut lemonade (a must-try if slightly hungover, also if not) and decent people. Love this place üôå

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Lovely  cafe with amazing coffee. Particularly liked this cafe as I could sit outside without the bother of cigarette smoke.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Wonderful new specialty coffee bar in the Jordaan. The owners are very friendly, and they specialize in Columbian beans. They also have nice pastries and empanadas. Must try!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: A very nice and cosy cafe. The owner makes you feel welcome and can really explain all the details is coffee making. All the latest types of coffee preparation techniques are available here. I'm happy that we visited. The prices are reasonable and reflect the quality.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Great coffee, cozy place

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Coffee with love. Self roasted coffee. Excellent, trendy (fruity) espresso. Delicious filter coffee and any other kind of coffee variation. Friendly family business. Thank you.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Great place! Very good coffee!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Supernice place with the sweetest waitress... just started but really welcoming.... warm like home

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Great coffee, really nice and well-balanced menu (brunch, yes please!) and kind people. Recommended!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Best coffee spot in town for me. Martin and colleagues are always friendly and caring, experimenting with the best coffee recipes - whether it‚Äôs a brew or in the kitchen. You have to come by and try!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Amazing place, super friendly owner, high quality coffee!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Delicious espresso and an increadibly good brownie, helpfull and lovely stuff

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: This place is totally wonderful. The coffee has the most delicious dark, strong taste, which they perfectly balance in their drinks. We had flat whites that finally tasted of coffee, not milk (our experience of so many other Dutch coffees). The owners are incredibly kind and friendly too. There‚Äôs no reason not to go! So, GO!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text:
Lovely coffee and friendly service.
I didn't eat but the food being served to other patrons looked delicious!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text:
This is a specialty coffee place where they roast their own coffee.
It is owned by a lovely couple. Here you get a coffee with a smile.
You will not be disappointed! Best flat white!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Favorite spot for good coffee in Jordaan.  Super friendly, family run shop with delicious coffee.  Added bonus is fantastic Cold Brew for hot summer days.  Our daughter loves their treats as well.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Such great quality and taste in everything they make. The carrot cake and coconut lemonade are particularly fantastic.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Great little specialty coffee espresso bar in the Jordaan. Friendly owner who also roasts the coffee himself. ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Coffee made with love, in any form you‚Äôd like it. Cold brew, V60, espresso or a lovely house drink specialty.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Any time I'm in Jordaan I try to make a stop here.  Some advice- their coffee is milkier than other cafes, so whereas I would normally get a latte, here I get a cappuccino. ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Easily some of the best coffee I've ever had. Flat whites are spot on and the espresso is just delicious. Extremely friendly staff, definitely my top recommendation for things to do in Amsterdam.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: A small, cute, beautiful, "coffee focused" place. They offer many brewing methods including syphon, cold drip etc. You are able to see the roasting process, they roast in small amounts. I think that makes the roasting more fresh and ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: If the quality of your coffee is what matters to you, this is the spot for you in Amsterdam. We get our beans here weekly and love also the iced lattes. Not to mention the service. The owners are so kind and happy to help pick something you‚Äôd like. Added bonus is the empanadas, such a treat to find good ones in the Netherlands!!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: What a wonderful coffee shop; it really is one for the purists. If you get asked how you would like your filter to be made you really are on for a winner. It seemed to me that every bit of care and attention was put into the brew. The beans ‚Ä¶

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: What amazing place!! Definitely the best cappuccino ever!! Five starts and more

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: The best coffee in the center. Can‚Äôt beat this place. Cool staff and they know what they doing. I bought also beans from Colombia, top quality. Can‚Äôt miss this place once in Amsterdam

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Great coffee and great people. Such a nice addition to the neighborhood. Has such a cozy feeling it seems like it's been here for years. You'll love everything you get, but definitely try the cold brew and the empanadas.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: I love coffee and without exaggerating this was the best coffee i drank in my life! It is a cute little place, friendly service and the coffees are made with the best coffee beans. I think coffee cant taste any better than the coffee you drink here

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text:
Best espresso place in the Jordaan, maybe even Amsterdam.
Come here often, large variety of options, cold brew, v60, syphon and more. Espresso is fantastic and strong. Definitely recommend to anyone in the area or just passing through.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Super neat coffee place with excellent Espresso

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Good coffee and very friendly staff.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Wonderful, restful, cozy! The owners are the nicest people. I had a delicious flat white with oat milk and I could have sat and drank them all day. Yummy snacks and drinks. Try the coconut lemonade!!!!!!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Excellent Chemex filter, tasty carrot cake and friendly owners. Great stuff!

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Such a wonderful little coffee shop! The owner was just marvellous and walked us through the process of roasting coffee whilst we were there. It‚Äôs in an unassuming side street which made it a fantastic find.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: love the coffee here, super sweet welcoming owners, really high quality coffee, they can also tell you stories about where they coffee comes from, how the beans look like etc. My place for coffee. Thank you Drupa ‚ù§Ô∏é

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Wonderful place to stop in for a coffee while wandering the city. Really clean vibe and great music. They serve five different kinds of pour over coffee and the owners were really helpful, friendly folks.

Name: Drupa Coffee Roasters
Review Text: Fantastic coffee and awesome owners! They are from Colombia and Argentina and source beans directly from producers in Colombia. Nice atmosphere in the shop as well. Just what the Jordaan needed!
